title: Defender Greataxe
content:
.15 380

Defender Greataxe

1d12 +2 Slashing

Defensive Attack: When making your first attack of the round, you can reduce this weapon's enchantment by 1 to increase your Armour Class and Saving Throw bonus by 1.

Weapon Enchantment +2

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The power of this axe lies in a fluctuating arcane enchantment that flows between the beard and the edge of the axe, and the wielder themselves.

Greataxe Two-Handed

Defender Greataxe is one of the Martial Two-Handed M
